main event: A civilian observed a white object with a red streak on the bottom in Greenville, Maine in 1952.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime as seen from the observer's position., The red streak on the bottom was caused by sunlight reflection., The object moved slowly eastward and was observed for about 1 hour., Other people attracted the observer's attention to the object due to its reflection., The observer estimated the object's altitude to be between 4900 to 5300 feet.
sighted object: one white object with red streak
